title: “Homage to Female composers from Latin America”
desc: This concert honors female composers from Latin America. Traditionally the music of these women is unknown to the public, even in their own countries. Part of our mission is to promote composers of minority background. This concert features music of ?the renowned Dominican composer Margarita Luna as well as others, considered a national treasure by Dominicans around the world. An ensemble group of female musicians from the Dominican Republic, lead by dominican pianist Jacqueline Huguet will perform these compositions. ? ? Este concierto rinde homenaje a compositoras de Am?rica Latina. Tradicionalmente la m?sica de estas compositoras es desconocida al p?blico general, especialmente en su pa?ses de origen. Parte de nuestra misi?n es promover obras de compositores minoritarios. Este concierto incluir? composiciones de la reconocida maestra Margarita Luna, considerada un tesoro nacional de la Rep?blica Dominicana, y el mundo. ?Un grupo de de mujeres int?rpretes de origen dominicano encabezadas por la pianista Jacqueline Huguet, interpretar?n las obras de estas compositoras .
